category: Click Boards > Wireless connectivity > Sub-1 GHz Transceivers
name: mikroe.click.neomesh868mhz
short_description: NeoMesh Click - 868MHz is a compact add-on board with a low-power, long-range transceiver, ideal for Mesh wireless networking. This board features the NC1000C-8, a wireless Mesh network module from NeoCortec. With an additional antenna that MikroE offers connected to the moduleâ€™s u.Fl connector, you can create a fully functional wireless Mesh network node that will work in the Sub-GHz frequency band of 868MHz. The module has a generic application layer that can configured to suit applications.
